Sample dataset over the Pacific Northwest

Source: R/data.R
sample_PNW.Rd

The sample_PNW dataset contains forecasted readings for temperature (TSK), elevation (HGT), and wind velocity (U10 & V10) across the Pacific Northwest on July 15, 2020. This data is used in several examples in the package documentation.

This dataset was generated on 2020-08-24 by running:

library(WRFmet)

sample_PNW &lt;- wrf_load(
  localPath = '~/Data/WRF/wrfout_d3-2020071512-f07-0000.nc',
  vars = c('HGT', 'TSK', 'U10', 'V10'),
  res = 0.06,
  xlim = c(-125, -111),
  ylim = c(42, 49)
)

Format

A RasterBrick containing 4 RasterLayers.

Contents

Developed by Jonathan Callahan, Tate Brasel.
